fieldUpdates.description: Update Account Name Hidden field to account name
fieldUpdates.name: Update Account Name Hidden

rules.description: Send Saas Transition Survey via GetFeedback NOTE - The immediate action is an Outbound Message that is generated by GF and thus only possible where we have connections from GF. Prod & UAT.
rules.formula: PRIORVALUE(Survey_Due__c ) <> Survey_Due__c && NOT(ISBLANK(Survey_Due__c)) && Survey_Due__c = 'Saas Transition NPS' && NOT ($Setup.T1_Control_Settings__c.Bypass_Workflow__c )

rules.description: For lookups on contact with account name
